resources.string:
🔍 What We Offer : 
Breaking News Alerts
 Curated Stories tailored to your interests.
Offline Reading for news on the go Multi-language Support
 Dark Mode for night readers

Samachar Application brings you the latest headlines from around the world—delivered fast, accurately, and without the noise. Whether you\'re into politics, tech, entertainment, sports, or global affairs, NewsPulse curates real-time news from trusted sources so you stay informed and ahead of the curve.
🛡️ Our Promise : We value journalistic integrity, and we’re committed to providing news that is factual, balanced, and free from bias or clickbait.

📬 Contact Us :\n Got feedback, questions, or suggestions? We’d love to hear from you! Whether you\'re reporting a bug, requesting a new feature, or just want to share your thoughts — your input helps us improve and grow. We value every message and do our best to respond as quickly as possible.

📍 Address : Samachar App Pvt. Ltd. 123 Innovation Street, 
Sector 21, Tech City, 
New Delhi, 110001, India 
🕒 Support Hours: Monday to Friday, 
9:00 AM – 6:00 PM (IST)
